resources.string: Open the following Activities, then come back to here. If you look in a memory tool, you\'ll see that sometimes the amount of memory goes up - the Activity leaked!
This activity should leak when you go back.
This activity should leak when you go back, but eventually release.
This activity should leak when you go back, but we unsubscribe to prevent the leak.
This activity should always auto-unsubscribe due to RxLifecycle\'s bindToLifecycle().
This activity feels like it ought to leak, but it does not.
